58% of Illinois residents live in a childcare desert. 

The #AmericanJobsPlan will modernize our nation’s schools and early learning facilities, and build new ones in neighborhoods across Illinois and the country. 5/

7% of Illinoisans do not have access to broadband internet.

The #AmericanJobsPlan would invest $100 billion to bring universal, reliable, high-speed, and affordable coverage to every family in America. 4/

21% of trains in Illinois are in poor condition.

The #AmericanJobsPlan devotes over $600 billion to transform our nation's transportation infrastructure, including roads & bridges. 2/
